gov.va.med.srcalc.web.controller.admin

Class EditRiskModelController

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.va.med.srcalc.web.controller.admin.EditRiskModelController

  • @Controller
@RequestMapping(value="/admin/models/{riskModelId}")
public class EditRiskModelController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller for editing existing RiskModels, including handling a bulk term upload.

        @RequestMapping(method=GET)
public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView displayForm(@PathVariable
                                                                      int riskModelId)
                                                         throws InvalidIdentifierException
        Displays a page for editing the given existing RiskModel.
        Parameters:
        riskModelId - the ID (surrogate key) of the RiskModel to edit
        Throws:
        InvalidIdentifierException - if no RiskModel exists with the ID

      • uploadTerms

        @RequestMapping(method=POST,
                params="uploadTerms")
public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView uploadTerms(@ModelAttribute(value="riskModel")
                                                                      EditRiskModel editModel,
                                                                      org.springframework.validation.BindingResult bindingResult,
                                                                      @RequestParam(value="termsFile")
                                                                      org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile termsFile)
                                                         throws java.io.IOException
        Imports a new set of EditModelTerms from the given Comma-Separated Value (CSV) upload.
        Parameters:
        editModel - the EditRiskModel to update
        termsFile - the CSV content
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs reading the CSV content

        Throws:
